scripts.snapshot:main: git fetch origin main && git worktree prune &&rm -rf .snapshot_worktree && git worktree add .snapshot_worktree origin/main && (cd .snapshot_worktree && forge snapshot --match-contract Benchmark --snap .temp-snapshot) && cp .snapshot_worktree/.temp-snapshot gas-snapshots/.gas-snapshot-main && git worktree remove --force .snapshot_worktree && git worktree prune
